case.state: Reporting for duty.
G-Fighter, ready to launch.
Core Booster, ready to launch.
I know you! You're the operations director at NERV!
Is that a Haro?!?
Nice normal suit!
Awesome! Another pilot!
Enemy pilot? Preparing to engage!
I'm glad there's another doctor here. I'd hate to be the only first responder.
(I hope she doesn't recognize me.)
Who else is going out on this sortie?
I hope you know I'm the best poker player on White Base.
Fair warning, I haven't lost yet among my shipmates.
Hope you prove better at poker than Bright.
Sayla in Core Fighter, launching.
No cards.
Only one card.
May I have ~cards.text~ cards?
~Cards.text~ should suffice.
Requesting ~cards.text~ new cards.
I want to exchange ~cards.text~.
~Cards.text~ for me, please.
Hey, it's a handful of Zabis.
Looks like I'm staying dressed.
No cold floor for me!
I have nothing to fear.
These are perfect.
Oh, excellent.
All too easy.
You can't beat me if I'm wearing pink!
This is like a Gundam taking on a Zaku.
Core Booster, preparing to engage.
I always win during Zeon Game Night!
Your magic can't help you here, Hermione.
How good must my hand be to win my boots back?
You're not getting my belt yet!
A good hand - and without the belt I can finally breathe.
I feel wonderful about this.
I did it!
I like my chances.
I was almost getting worried there.
Looks like my treasures remain secure.
You're not going to see my breasts that easily!
Nothing to worry about for now.
I'm safe.
Finally!
I'm still in this!
Maybe I can turn this around!
Beginning counter-attack!
Oh good, the dealer actually decided to give me a good hand!
Maybe this isn't over after all.
Better late than never I guess.
I guess the dealer likes my body.
This hand ought to keep my boots on.
No cold floor for me!
I will make do.
I think this is good.
Hmm.
I won't make the same mistake twice.
Wow, this game is more fun when the stakes are high.
I have seen worse.
I have no complaints.
Not too shabby.
With a bit of luck, my uniform is safe.
I must not let my guard down now.
I need better than average at this point.
I am not afraid.
I was hoping for a lot more.
Last piece of clothing, better make this count.
This better be enough.
This hand is average but my hands are spectacular, as you'll learn, if you're lucky.
I'm not done playing yet.
Ah, don't count the naked girl out yet.
Awful hand, but I can afford to lose this one.
Well, this was bound to happen eventually.
Is my luck running out?
I didn't see this coming.
Being back on Earth takes some getting used to.
I'd rather take on a Musai in a GM.
This is as bad as the time I had a Spanish accent...
Dealer, I am trained in firearms. Just keep that in mind if you keep giving me hands like these.
I thought New-types could see the future...
Oh sure, just give me a bunch of terrible cards. I can figure it out.
A bad hand - and my feet are cold too.
Damn it, I might as well take of my tights right now.
I mustn't give up.
Why does this keep happening to me?
Typical.
Oh boy, I hope I'm wearing nice underwear.
If I can't turn this around at least you are in for a good show.
Oh, not now.
This is a Zabi plot.
Clearly someone's cheating; I'll take it as a compliment.
I don't want to get naked... Well, I don't want to lose, at least.
Whatever, I'm in the mood for some self-care anyway.
Oh no.
If this goes how I think it might, you're in for something special.
Petty Officer Sayla Mass. Nice to meet you!
Petty Officer Sayla Mass. This'll be fun.
I might be bluffing, I might not.
I would use sunglasses to help my poker face, but I don't really want to mimic my brother.
I wonder if I can convince Mirai to join...
Watch where you point that Aimee...
I've already accepted I'm going to get shot.
Aimee's cowboy outfit reminds me of when I lived on a ranch.
You're more than welcomed to join me for some horseback riding Aimee, or is the costume just for show?
You'd be right at home on Texas Colony, Aimee.
You sure do like your makeup, Calisto...
Lighten up Cammy, have fun.
So D.Va, what Gundam games have you played?
I hope you prove a challenge D.Va, and not just talk.
You better not start digging for buried chests, Elaine.
Ya sabes, tambien hablo espa√±ol, Elaine.
Don't you think you're overdoing the pirate bit, Elaine?
Are New-type senses anything like Spider-Senses?
There's a great punk rock band on Side 5 called Munzo Front. I'll get you a copy of their stuff.
Have you ever tried web-slinging in zero g?
Let me know if you ever want to go to space, Spidey.
What school did you say you went to again, Hanako?
Who's this Lily you keep talking about? You should totally bring her here!
Any good books you can recommend Hanako?
Rin is best girl, but you're a good second Hanako.
You should get out more, Mavis.
(How do you even find a pet penguin?)
So why are EVAs so much larger than Gundams?
Think I can get one of those beers, Misato?
I bet Amuro and Shinji would get along quite well.
If you ever need a job, Misato, I'm sure the Federation would hire you in a heartbeat.
That's an... odd uniform, Ryuko...
Okay Ryuko, who's this girl that keeps running in here?
That's a pretty hot normal suit Samus!
Samus Aran; intergalactic bounty hunter and kick ass blonde!
I'd hire you any day, Samus.
Do you have any openings in your class, Trainer?
You look really pale, Trainer. I know a beach nearby if you want to sunbath with me. Swimsuit not required.
Ours don't have giant aliens inside hell bent on destroying us.
Two in a row?
Two bad hands. That's nothing.
Don't get cocky, it's only two hands.
Who's dealing these cards?
Focus Sayla.
I'm not used to losing like this.
I just figured you needed a handicap.
I was just beginning to enjoy the feeling of sand between my toes and now it's ruined!!!
It's going to take more than that to end my hot streak.
Everyone else is doing it, so why not?
At least I still have my shirt on, ~player~!
My turn? I was beginning to feel left out.
There goes my flawless run.
No problem. A minor setback!
Alright, let's even the odds a little.
I'm not done yet!
You think I'm out?
Don't get full of yourself yet.
The tactical situation is still in my favor.
You may have won the battle, but not the war!
You may be motivated by revenge, but I'm afraid you're the one making the mistake.
If I wasn't winning I'd be more annoyed.
You guys are all lasting a lot longer than the White Base crew!
The battle isn't over yet!
Usually they would be out of chips by now...
Eh, why not?
Don't think you've won yet. I've got one round left!
This is just the beginning.
Are you a New-type or something?
This is exciting.
I performed admirably given the circumstances.
I guess nobody has all the answers all the time.
Now remember, the swimsuit counts as two pieces!
I'm not ashamed to show myself to you.
I came to the beach to relax, not get swept under the table.
Why am I the only one who has to do this?
A temporary setback.
Me again? Who shuffled these cards?
I have to reconsider my strategy.
My uniform too? How merciless.
You're really in a hurry to see my chest, huh?
Why do I have to do this so soon?
No Spooky, but it bought me time.
At least it bought me time.
If you win you can find out.
It's in the rules Spooky.
The boots are my favorite part of the Federation uniform.
I love my boots.
I get my boots back later, right?
Federation boots are great for kicking Zeon ass!
The buckle is a little fiddly.
I don't mind taking my belt off.
I hope it's not stuck again.
A setback, nothing more.
You better not steal my tights!
Let me just peel these off.
My tights are probably the most valuable thing I'm wearing, so hands off!
I lost on purpose. I j-just needed to cool down is all.
Oh! I forgot I'm still wearing my swimsuit!
My swimsuit? I forgot I was at the beach earlier.
I know you've all been waiting for this.
Okay, I'll show you, but you better be grateful.
Alright, you can see them.
I'm sure you've all seen a woman before.
I don't see why this has to be so dramatic.
I hope I live up to your expectations.
You know I know a great beach nearby.
You're going to have to try better than that to scare me, Beatrix.
(White, red and black? Does she know my brother?)
Well Futaba, you can get drafted during an attack or you can apply at the closest Federation Base.
Sorry Spidey, it's not the coat.
Secret identity? Never! (How did she find out?)
Sorry Spooky, non-negotiable.
Just think of it as a challenge, Spooky.
I swear this is just like Halloween.
It's not like you don't apparate clothes on, Spooky.
At least you aren't making inappropriate comments about my boo- Never mind.
I swear Elaine, you and Kai...
Rest assured I can fight without them.
I always wondered if they're made of real leather.
Good boots are worth fighting for.
Ah, I should have taken that off sooner.
I can breathe now.
It's actually pretty heavy.
Quality hosiery is hard to come by since the war broke out.
They look nice but sometimes they make my skirt ride up.
I hope I didn't rip them.
Though it's a one-piece, it counts as two pieces. End of discussion.
It's like a bra and panties in one, so I'll take it off in two stages. Not negotiable.
I'm glad they took my amendment to the rules.
Here they are.

I don't get the opportunity to do this that often... The only chance I get is when I'm reviewing manuals.
I have to pretend I'm reading tech manuals if I get in the mood while on duty. It just kinda carried over.
Light, highly modular and above all cheap, the MS-06 Zaku II is arguably the most successful mobile suit design ever.
The MW-01 Mobile Worker was developed under the guise of heavy construction equipment but was actually an early Zeon mobile suit prototype.
The RX-75-4 Guntank is perhaps more of a self-propelled artillery piece than a tank, but it certainly gets results.
The G-fighter is a variable range fighter craft specialized to support the Gundam.
The MS-09B Dom is a heavy, yet incredibly fast unit, handily outperforming Zeon Zaku II:s and Federation GMs alike.
Calling the RX-79[G] ground type a Gundam is perhaps an overstatement - It is built from spare parts left over from the Gundam's development.
The production model Gundam-type is the RGM-79 GM: a fine mid-range fighter admittedly lacking the Gundam's close quarters competency.
The MS-04 Bugu was the high-performance prototype for the mass-produced Zaku, much like the Gundam was to the GM.
The MS-07B Gouf is designed specifically for Earth-based, close-quarter MS combat. Very, close-quarter.
The FF-X7-Bst Core Booster is a Core Fighter combined with a heavy-duty booster module, greatly improving speed, firepower, and operational stamina.
You can join me and find out more Misato.
S-sure Misato.
O-okay Misato. Just r-remind me after this.
B-Type Equipment is the standard Evangelion armor. It is unsuited for use in wet conditions.
The MSM-03 Gogg, designed for -hnhh- amphibious combat and operation in wet biomes that are just dripping and soo soft.
And the ... Guncannon, RX-77-2, provides -uhh- fire support for the Gundam with its big ... throbbing 240mm cannons.
The MSM-04 Acguy is -ahhhhhh!- an amphibious suit that excels at stealthy insertion- I mean infiltration deep -so deep- behind the lines.
Of course the RX-78-2 Gundam, the first mobile suit equipped with a beam weapon, allowing it to gently melt and penetrate any armor -mmm- so easily.
FF-X7-Bst Core Booster is armed with a pair of mega -hnhhhhh- particle cannons. The high output allows them to penetrate thick, thick mobile suit armor.
Real g-forces are more -hhhnhhh- intense than anything in the simulator.
G-fighter taking-ghh oooffff! Hhnghih!
C-core Booster taking-ghh ooofffff! Hhnghih!
Gundam, t-t-taking ooofffff!!! Hhnghih!

I like winning but... some things are better than winning.
I feel like I lost the battle and won the war.
To the victor go the spoils.

Hey ~target~, want to join me in my quarters?

scene.directive: Universal Century 0081. November.
The newly rebuilt White Base is assigned to monitor former Zeon territory for remnants.

and is specialized for mhmm... piercing through armor.
The RGM-79SC GM Sniper Custom's rifle, compared to the standard beam rifle, has a higher focusing rate.
It also sports a much longer barrel.
The MS-09B Dom used a 'hit hard and hit fast' attack philosophy.
The sp-speed it could-
-hngh-
-finish it's opponents is legendary.
